document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the type specimens of Diptera deposited in the Department of Entomology, National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic *

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the type specimens of Diptera deposited in the Department of Entomology, National Museum, Prague, Czech Republic *

subSubSection.paragraph: (http://www.morphbank.net/?id=840024)

Berdeniella kocii Ježek, 2006: 156
, Figs 16–31.
The holotype and 59 paratypes are deposited in NMPC:

HOLOTYPE (J): ‘Czech / Republic / Moravia bor.-occ., / Branná (NW vicinity) / (5867), Kronfelzov (= / Pastviny), Brusný potok / brook near a hill, / 11.vii.1994 , J. Ježek leg. / 14810 / small forest flows, / pastures, swamps, / flocullated iron,
Picea ,
/
Alnus, Acer, Fraxinus ,
/
Rubus , Aruncus ,
/
Petasites, Mentha
[p] //
Berdeniella kocii
/ Ježek, 2006 / male / HOLOTYPE / Cat. No. 34312 / J. Ježek det. / 2006 [p, red label]’.
